Name: Isuzu
Fate:
Sunk 7 April 1945 by USN submarines off Sumbawa, Java Sea
07°38′S 118°09′E﻿ / ﻿7.633°S 118.150°E﻿ / -7.633; 118.150
Propulsion:
4 shaft Gihon geared turbines
12 Kampon boilers
90,000 shp (67,000 kW)
Armament:
(Initial)
7 × 14 cm/50 3rd Year Type naval guns
2 × 8 cm/40 3rd Year Type naval gun s
8 × 533 mm (21.0 in) torpedo tubes  (4x2)
48 naval mines
(Final) 3 × 2 12.7 cm/40 Type 89 naval gun s
11 × triple, 17x single Type 96 25 mm AA guns
depth charges
Armor:
Belt: 60 mm (2.4 in)
Deck: 30 mm (1.2 in)
